[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1570735330392{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”This 2021 competitive analysis report walks you through SharpSpring and HubSpot feature by feature to help you select the right fit for your business needs.” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1610035205422{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_separator color=”green” align=”align_left” border_width=”3″ el_width=”20″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”The guide covers:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1507215678556{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

  • Pricing / terms
  • Email, automation & form features
  • Contact tracking capabilities
  • Customer support
  • Social media features
  • And much more …

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”123101″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” el_class=”xm-hide”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Mark Cohen

President, Colloquy Digital

“SharpSpring provides all the functionality my clients and I need most at a fraction of the cost of leading competitors. Before choosing SharpSpring, I was hands-on with Hubspot, Marketo, and Act-On, and chose SharpSpring because it was much easier to learn and use than those platforms.”

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
